features: 100% waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX® insert + Gore warm technology
Three heat levels with LED button controls
Waterproof zippered battery compartment stores rechargeable lithium-ion battery
Full goat leather shell with two-layer Pertex Shield nylon gauntlet cuff
